attributes.action: PCSOS should have the power of search
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister wants to eradicate knife crime in the UK. PCSOs can play a big part in this, and make it a reality. PCSOs need to have the power of search, and at least carry handcuffs. Too much time is wasted waiting for a Police Officer to come and do a search when a suspect has been stopped. PCSOs badly need increased powers. The power of search is probably the one that would make the biggest difference.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement eg "Give PCSOs powers to..."
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
